nodes.title: AI and Computer Vision Engineer
responsibilities: Developed scalable platforms in TypeScript, tRPC, and Node.js, integrating computer vision models for agricultural map analysis with Qgis. The models, trained with YoloX and Roboflow, achieved an accuracy of +95% in identifying plant diseases and pests, as well as counting and identifying cattle behavior.

Built ontological knowledge graphs using MongoDB, Milvus, and Cytoscape.js for visualization, enabling complex analysis and business insights. Implemented vector embeddings for semantic search and relationship mapping between entities.

Integrated LLMs (Gemini 1.5 pro, Claude 3.5 sonnet, Ollama 3, gpt-4o) through APIs, utilizing advanced prompt engineering techniques to ingest data from documents based on the ontology, generate automated reports from the insights, and issue alerts.
Managed the project's relational database with Prisma ORM.
Researched and implemented various ontology frameworks and tools including:
- Portkey for secure authentication and access control in knowledge graph systems
- Cognee for semantic reasoning and inference capabilities
- Palantir Foundry for large-scale data integration and analysis
- Neo4j for graph database management and querying
- RDF/OWL standards for knowledge representation
- SPARQL for complex graph queries and data retrieval
Developed custom ontology schemas and taxonomies to model agricultural domain knowledge
Implemented semantic search and recommendation systems using vector embeddings and similarity metrics

nodes.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Developed VR solutions in Node.js and React for training and wellness, implementing features such as interaction with 3D objects, physics simulations.

Built scalable APIs with Node.js and Express, using queues for asynchronous task processing and pub/sub for real-time communication between system components. The use of queues enabled the processing of large 3D video files and updates of games compiled in Unity and Unreal.
Implemented unit and integration tests with Jest, ensuring software quality and reliability.
Created data visualization dashboards with Chart.js, integrated with a CRM system to track user progress in training, headset usage insights, and more.
Implemented a robust and scalable infrastructure in Azure App Service and Blob Storage, using CI/CD (GitOps) practices to automate the deployment process and ensure environment stability.
Ensured compliance with US healthcare industry security and privacy standards (FedRAMP and HIPAA), implementing a deployment protocol with Red Hat OpenShift containers.

nodes.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Developed scalable microservice APIs in Python with Flask and FastAPI, using the gRPC framework for inter-service communication. These APIs processed an average of 100,000 requests per day with an average latency of 150 ms.

Implemented data pipelines in Python, using Apache Beam and the Google Cloud Dataflow service for distributed and large-scale processing. The pipelines processed countless GB of data daily, from tax documents, credit agreements, and images for security identification services.
Orchestrated data pipelines with Apache Airflow, deployed on Google Cloud Composer, scheduling and monitoring workflow execution.
Used Google Cloud Pub/Sub to implement asynchronous and decoupled communication between microservices, ensuring system scalability and resilience.
Stored processed data in a Data Lake on Google Cloud Storage (GCS), optimized for analytical queries with Google Cloud BigQuery.
Implemented unit and integration tests (TDD) with pytest, ensuring code quality and API reliability.
Monitored system performance and health with Google Cloud Monitoring and Logging, configuring alerts to guarantee service availability.
Managed infrastructure as code (IaC) with Terraform, automating resource provisioning and management in GCP.
Built responsive web interfaces with React and NextJS, consuming microservice APIs.

nodes.title: Backend Developer Intern
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs in Python with Django and Django REST Framework (DRF) to collect and manage sensor data. The APIs processed data from sensors, transmitting information every minutes/seconds.
Implemented the sensor data collection logic on Raspberry Pi devices using BalenaCLI, integrating with DRF. The collected data included silo volume, microphone audio, and camera images.
Built a data processing pipeline in Python to receive, process, and feed the RDS database where the ML models would consume it.
Created Bash automation scripts to back up data and update software on Raspberry Pi devices.

Developed front-end interfaces with Vue.js for real-time visualization of sensor data, allowing livestock farmers to monitor their swine herds. The interfaces displayed information such as health indicators in pig pens, volume with loading and unloading in silos, and translation of volume to kg/ton.
Used BalenaCLI to manage and deploy software on Raspberry Pi devices, facilitating system updates and maintenance in the field.

nodes.description: Pedro is a highly motivated and skilled full-stack developer and data engineer with a proven track record of delivering successful projects in various domains. His experience ranges from building scalable APIs and data pipelines to implementing complex VR solutions and integrating AI/ML models. He's a quick learner, adaptable to new technologies, and possesses strong problem-solving and communication skills. Pedro's passion for innovation and his commitment to quality make him a valuable asset to any team.

A calm and balanced individual born and raised in Florianópolis. Married to Anna, a theater teacher and photographer. Pedro maintains a healthy lifestyle and values spending time in nature. He has a background in martial arts, having practiced both judo and jiu-jitsu. In his free time, he enjoys playing guitar, video games, and cherishes moments with friends. He appreciates meeting new people while also valuing moments of peace and quiet
